short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find best-matched social creators from TikTok, Instagram and Youtube with augmented analytics from BENA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bena Creators Chrome Extension is a data augmentation analytical tool for the social creators from Tiktok, Instagram and Youtube. It enables the social influencers to have a deeper insights into how the creators perform on the social contents, with augmented analytics backed by AI-powered engine from BENA. The extension could boost the productivities for the social marketers 10x or more by reducing the back-and-forward time checking across tools, spreadsheets, and switching between social platforms and influencer platforms. Instead, Bena Chrome Extension provides the seamless user experience by augmenting the data from the native social application so the users could keep the native user experience as well as gaining insights from our creator analytics engine. 

Download and try the Bena Creator Extension. You will see the benefit from the next second the extension loads.
